name: MYFIRSTC#PROJECT
description:
Tthis one is for my man Emiel.

The first game I made on my own, this was 3 years ago. I didn't know how to program but now I do :)

.

.

.

how to playayaya:

- use left mouse button to click and drag the puzzle pieces.

- use right mouse button to turn the pieces.

you can't turn off the sound hahaha.

(it was originally made for an android tablet, but the build is for windows ONLY).

bu bye <3
